name: Monkfish Provincial
author: Paul Kandel
summary: A great recipe for monkfish or tilapia with garlic, tomatoes, mushrooms, and white wine. This is one of my mother's favorite recipes! Serve over pasta or rice.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds monkfish fillets, roughly chopped
directions: In a resealable plastic bag, mix the salt, pepper, Cajun seasoning, and flour
Place the monkfish in the bag, seal, and shake to lightly coat
Heat the oil and melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat
Place the monkfish in the skillet, and cook for about 3 minutes
Mix in the garlic, tomato, and mushrooms, and continue cooking 3 minutes
Mix in the wine and parsley
Continue to cook and stir 2 minutes, or until the monkfish flakes easily with a fork
